newsitem.title: USA: FOB Gulf Grain - Winter wheat values steady.
newsitem.headline: FOB Gulf Grain - Winter wheat values steady.

text.p: U.S. FOB Gulf soft red winter and hard red winter wheat values were unchanged in quiet dealings, amid widespread talk of pending deals to Morocco and Egypt, exporters said.

Exporters said Egypt was expected to tender soon for wheat, with some trade estimates putting the amount up to 750,000 tonnes for August to October positions. However, exporters said no tender announcement had been received Wednesday.
Nearby soybean basis values eased again in reaction to another day of strong gains in CBOT soybean futures. However, deferred soybean basis offers rose in light dealings.
Corn values were unchanged in nearby positions and slightly lower in deferred positions.
CORN (No. 3 yellow, FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis CBOT, cts/bu) -
SOYBEANS (No. 2 yellow, FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis CBOT, cts/bu)
LH July unq nc +61 + Q dn 1
FH October unq nc +90 + X up 10
LH October unq nc +55 + X unc
Note: Q=CBOT August, X=CBOT November, nc=no comparison
SRW WHEAT (FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis CBOT, cts/bu) -
HRW WHEAT (FOB, U.S. Gulf, basis KCBT, cts/bu) -
